title: Ian Somerhalder
summary: Ian Joseph Somerhalder  (born December 8, 1978)[1] is an American actor, model, activist and director.[2] He is known for playing Boone Carlyle in the TV drama Lost, Damon Salvatore in The CW's supernatural drama The Vampire Diaries and Dr. Luther Swann in Netflix's sci-fi horror series V Wars.
